verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There is a river Whose streams make glad Streams make glad The city of God (repeat){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The dwelling places The dwellling places Holy places Of the Most High{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}God is in the midst of her God will help her when morning dawns God is in the midst of her She will not be moved (2x at the end) (repeat){/lang-eng}
